rukus.text: 'in aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana

'in aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana

'in aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana

'iina aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana

akhbr -ayha alrswl- eibadi 'aniy 'ana alghafur lilmuminin altaybyn, alrahim bhm, wa'ana eadhabi hu aleadhab almwlm almwje lighayr altaybyn. wakhbrhm -ayha alrswl- ean duyuf 'iibrahim min almalayikat aladhin bshsharwh balwld, wbhlak qawm lwt

akhbr -ayha alrswl- eibadi 'aniy 'ana alghafur lilmuminin altaybyn, alrahim bhm, wa'ana eadhabi hu aleadhab almwlm almwje lighayr altaybyn. wakhbrhm -ayha alrswl- ean duyuf 'iibrahim min almalayikat aladhin bshsharwh balwld, wbhlak qawm lwt

akhbr -ayha alrswl- eibadi 'aniy 'ana alghafur lilmuminin altaybyn, alrahim bhm, wa'ana eadhabi hu aleadhab almwlm almwje lighayr altaybyn. wakhbrhm -ayha alrswl- ean duyuf 'iibrahim min almalayikat aladhin bshsharwh balwld, wbhlak qawm lwt
hyn dakhaluu ealayh fqalu: slamana; fard ealayhim alslam, thuma qddam lahum altaeam falam yaklu, qal: 'iinaa minkum fzewn
qalt almalayikat lh: la tfze 'inna jina nubashiruk bwld kthyr aleilm baldyn, hu 'ishaq
qal 'iibrahim mtejbana: abshshartmwny balwld, wa'ana kabir wzwjty kdhlk, fabi'ayi aejwbt tbshshirwnny?
qalu: bshsharnak bialhaqi aldhy aelmana bih allh, fala takun min alyaysyn 'ana yualid lk
qal: la yyys min rahmat rabih 'iilaa alkhatiuwn almnsrfwn ean tariq alhq. qal: fama al'amr alkhatir aldhy jitum min 'ajalih -ayha almrslwn- min eind allh?
qal: la yyys min rahmat rabih 'iilaa alkhatiuwn almnsrfwn ean tariq alhq. qal: fama al'amr alkhatir aldhy jitum min 'ajalih -ayha almrslwn- min eind allh?

qalu: 'iina allah 'arsalna l'ihlak qawm lut almushrikin aldaaliyn 'iilaa lwtana wa'ahlah almuminin bh, falan nhlkhm wsnnjyhm ajmeyn, lkn zawjatih alkafrt qadayna bi'amr allah b'ihlakha mae albaqin fi aledhab
